comment.author: 37509979@N02
comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Boeing Classics, and we'd love to have this added to the group!

comment.author: 25695066@N00
comment._content:
This aircraft entered service with Delta Air Lines in April 1984 as N315DL (c/n 23087/1013), after Delta it would enter operation for Venezolana in November 2007 as YV302T, and was still in operation as of January 2013.

Here it is landing at Queen Beatrix International Airport (AUA / TNCA) in September 2010.
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/25695066@N00/5387056647/]
